nodes.text: The Security and Intelligence Council, also known as Palpatine's War Council, or the Military Advisory Council, was an organization of the Galactic Republic's government during the Clone Wars. It consisted of Palpatine's most trusted advisers, though membership changed often. Senator Jannie Ha'Nook was a ranking member, along with Mas Amedda, Sate Pestage, Armand Isard and Kohl Seerdon.
